<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/shipment/{shipmentReference}/settlement/confirm"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This will confirm the carrier shipment settlement. This is equivalent of posting a "final" shipment carrier settlement
